entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
